152211121.content:
Though the idea of making love to a beautiful alien female is tempting, even with the differences in anatomy, you're rather worn out from your day, which has been one big emotional roller coaster so far, what with being visited by a cosmic energy being and offered a chance to change the world, threatened with death by that same energy being, abducted, questioned, and then informed that you would be remaining on the alien ship indefinitely whether you like it or not, forced to act as breeding stock for a horde of horny alien females, though the fact that said horny alien females happen to be quite beautiful makes that last bit far less of a burden, particularly with the promise of being able to study the technology and culture of a whole other species thrown in. Still though, you doubt you'd be much fun as a partner right now, particularly with the language barrier still firmly in place, so, after a quick meal of... something, you're not really sure what, but it doesn't taste too bad, you climb into bed, attempting to fall asleep, though you doubt it'll be that easy, your mind still working a mile a minute trying to process the events of the day.

That makes it all the more surprising when, the next thing you know, you find yourself being gently shaken awake, apparently having slept the whole night already, not even remembering ever having fallen asleep. Rolling over and looking around, you spot a stern faced Galval female with light, yellowish tan skin, surprisingly human looking eyes, set within a narrow face with sharp, but not unattractive features, and surmounted by a shock of shoulder length red hair. Her expression, while not openly hostile, doesn't seem particularly friendly either, as she continues staring suspiciously at you, as though expecting you to try to escape at any minute, her hand resting on the butt of what appears to be a weapon of some sort, reminding you of some sort of futuristic riot baton. It's only after you make this observation that the oddity of it hits you. This Galval female actually has arms, two of them in the usual human position, as well as legs, both they as well as the rest of her body clad in a tight black jumpsuit that leaves little to the imagination, with dull grey armor plates covering her chest crotch and forearms with a more flexible rubber like material protecting her abdomen, knees, and elbows, her feet encased in a pair of highly polished, but functional looking black boots that come up to just below the knee.

The Galval female, apparently a soldier of some kind judging by the armor, seems slightly agitated, uttering a few harsh words in a language you've never heard before, Eviee never having actually spoken last night except in your mind, before stepping back and motioning you towards the door. Getting the picture even if you can't understand the words, you quickly climb out of bed and start heading towards the door, only pausing for a moment to look around for your shies, only to remember that you didn't have any, not having been wearing any when you were abducted. with a sigh, you step out into the corridor, being careful to move slowly and keep your hands in sight at all times, not wanting to give the Galval soldier any excuses to use that weapon of hers, something that she seems all too eager to do. Passing through a number of short hallways, encountering a number of Galval females along the way possessing a varied number of limbs, and clothing styles, as well as a vast rainbow of different skin, hair, and eye colors, as well as a few odder variations, such as one blue skinned girl who appears to have four breasts, though her limbs are absent, the girl floating along apparently unsupported, as are many of the others who lack legs, while yet another possess a third eye in the middle of her forehead, while a third appears vaguely animal like, with fox like ears, a partial muzzle, light fur, and digitigrade hind legs, though she still manages to walk upright like all the other Galval, at least those who possess legs to begin with. All this variation doesn't seem normal for a single species, though you've only your knowledge of Earth life forms to go by, and if you had to guess, you figure it's most likely a side effect caused by the Galval's interbreeding with the males of other alien species. The reactions you receive from these females is almost as varied as their appearance, ranging from mild curiosity, to wariness or even open fear, while others seemed friendlier, smiling and waving if they were capable of it, and even a few expressing open lust, at least, that's what you get from their expressions. Those same expressions may well mean different things to the Galval however, as they truly are alien, and you shouldn't take anything you see for granted until you can have it confirmed by another member of their species. Hopefully, the Galval female is escorting you to the infirmary and your meeting with Eviee, after which, provided everything goes as the two of you hope, you'll actually be able to start communicating with them and find out whether any of your guesses are right or not.

After making your way through this maze, you and your guard, which you've privately nicknamed Flare due to her hair color and general behavior so far, arrive at what appears to be an elevator. Gesturing you inside, Flare follows you in, making sure to keep her weapon as far from you as possible, and presses a couple of buttons. Despite the sound of machinery whirring to life, there's no inertia involved whatsoever, and briefly you wonder whether you're even moving, maybe the lift is malfunctioning, but you soon find otherwise as the lift doors slide open, allowing you and Flare to step out into an area completely different from the one you left, a medical facility of some kind judging by the look of it. Passing by a number of sealed doors, and a number of orderlies pushing various patients and pieces of sophisticated looking equipment, including one patient on a gurney, an unconscious girl that, had she been human, you would have guessed to be no more sixteen years old, with deeply tanned skin, a cute childlike face with rosy cheeks and a small upturned nose, a long, thick mane of pure white hair down to just below her ass, wide hips, a narrow waste, and a pair of large perky breasts, double D's at the very least. While that alone would have easily been enough to get your attention, what shocks you the most however are the heavy bandages covering the girls shoulders and hips, her arms and legs completely absent, apparently having just recently been amputated for reasons unknown to you, the first indication that the missing limbs so common among Galval females might not be entirely natural. You suppose the amputations could have been in response to a disease of some kind, but the limbless females you've seen so far all appeared healthy, and not in the least disturbed by their lack of limbs, not the sort of thing you would expect from a person who has underwent an amputation. This reminds you yet again that the Galval are truly alien, and there's really no way for you to understand what's going on until someone becomes willing and able to tell you. Arriving in front of yet another door that looks much the same as the others, Flare gestures for you to wait, pressing in a code and allowing the door to slide open, reveling what appears to be a hospital room of some kind, with a pair of beds, with Eviee laying in one of them, her formal robes exchanged for a dark blue jumpsuit, revealing that she, like so many other Galval females, is in fact completely limbless, thus the reason for her floating yesterday. In addition to Eviee, there is another female in the room, this one dressed in a light green set of medical scrubs that compliment her yellowish green skin tone, with neon pink hair, eyes of purest black just like Eviee, and a complete lack of limbs, something that you've almost come to expect from the Galval by this point. You also notice some sort of machinery against the wall between the two beds, a pair of metal helmets attached to it by wires. What this is for you haven't the foggiest idea, but you suspect you're about to find out.

Pointing towards the unoccupied bed and uttering a few words, the female you've nicknamed Flare shoves you forward, causing you to stumble slightly, though you swiftly regain your balance. Walking towards the hospital bed, you turn, shooting a glare over your shoulder as Eviee says a few stern sounding words to Flare in the Galval language, presumably a reprimand. Flare responds in kind, uttering a few harsh words of her own before crossing her arms in front of her and looking away, only for Eviee to smile, uttering a few more words in what, had she been human, you would have taken for a teasing tone, causing flare to blush slightly and begin studying her feet and uttering a few soft words. You really wish you knew what was going on here, but now is not the time, as you feel yourself suddenly lifted up onto the bed by an unseen force and strapped in, before one of the metal helmet is placed over you head, with Eviee receiving the other, before suddenly everything went dark.

1522111211.content:
You awaken to find yourself once more within the mental realm, only you and Eviee's mental image within a void of endless darkness. "Well met Adam Tate. I'm afraid I must apologize for my nieces rudeness.

"Your niece? Flare?" you inquired.

"Flare? So that's what you have chosen to call her. I suppose it is appropriate, she does have a fiery temper, and the hair to match. Her true name however is Grizella, and yes, as much as it shames me at times to admit it, she is in fact my niece. Please try not to take her actions too personally however, as she is suspicious of outsiders at the best of times, and with her time of estrus having only recently passed without a mate, I am afraid she has become even more irritable than usual." Eviee explained.

"Huh, alien PMS, that figures. So uh, I've got a few questions about your society if you don't mind." you said.

"Can they wait? We do have a procedure to complete, and mental conversation can be quite draining if carried on over an extended period of time." Eviee pointed out.

"Yea, I guess so. And it will be a lot easier to ask questions once I'm capable of communicating properly." you answered reluctantly.

"Very well. Then if you have no objections, I shall now begin the knowledge transfer. Please keep in mind, this is probably going to hurt." Eviee warned.

Gulping, you reply "Uh, I guess I'm as ready as I'll ever be."

"Good, then let us begin." Eviee said, before suddenly your mind was assaulted with countless images and sounds, words and letters in an alien dialect, interspersed with images of the concepts they were associated with, along with the same words in your own language, swirling through your mind over and over at incredible speed, with occasional images of your past life boobing to the surface, only to be lost in the swirling maelstrom of information. It's overwhelming, and you can already feel a headache coming on, the pain steadily increasing in intensity. How long this goes on for you couldn't say, your sense of time having been thrown completely out the window, before you finally are awakened by the sound of screaming, only to discover that the person screaming is you, your body reacting to the pain your mind is experiencing. Abruptly, your body goes stiff, and you pass out once more, not to awaken until several hours latter.

15221112111.content:
As you slowly come to for the second time, you hear a soft voice calling you. You force your eyes open, only to swiftly close them, the bright light in the room being overwhelming. Deciding to try again, you open your eyes only the tiniest degree, Allowing them to adjust to the light, before opening them the rest of the way.

"Oh good, you're awake. I was starting to think you'd never wake up. Uh, you can understand me right?" the voice asked.

Looking over towards the direction that the voice sounds like it's coming from, you look across to the bed next to you to see the limbless girl you'd seen on the gurney earlier, her bandages having been removed, leaving healthy looking skin in their place, with only the smallest of scars to mark where her limbs used to be, though even those seemed to be fading. She was staring intently at you with the biggest, most beautiful blue eyes you'd ever seen, a friendly and innocent smile on her face.

Coughing a couple of times due to your throat being unaccountably dry, you reply "Yea, I can understand you. You look better by the way. How long was I out?" you asked.

Almost a week! They had you in intensive care for most of it, they only put you in here with me a couple of days ago." the girl answered.

"A week!" you screamed. Well, tried to anyway, it ended up coming out as more of a croak.

"Uh huh. Apparently there was some sort of compatibility issue during the transfer that damaged your brain, and they had to keep you sedated until your mind could repair itself. My names Avarina Wan by the way, but most people just call me Ava. So, what's your name?"

Doing your best to calm yourself, as getting upset over what happened wouldn't do you any good, and concentrating on the conversation instead, you replied "My name is Adam Tate. I'm a human male from the planet Earth."

Upon hearing your response, Ava's eyes get even bigger if possible, as she gasps and says "Wow! I've never met a human before, or heard of Earth for that matter. And a male too! Oh, I'm so lucky to have met you! You have no idea how boring it is just laying here by myself not being able to do anything."

Deciding this is you're cue to ask a couple questions of your own that you've been wondering about, you inquire "Yea, about that. Why are you limbless anyway? I mean, were you in an accident or suffering from a disease or something, or what?"

Surprisingly, rather than being upset by your question, Ava actually laughs! "Wow, you are new aren't you? Okay, I guess it won't hurt anything for me to tell you, you'll figure it out sooner or latter anyway. See, our species, the Galval, possess powerful psychic abilities, low level flight, telekinesis, telepathy, the works. You've already experienced some of that, so you should sort of know what I'm talking about. What you probably don't know yet is that, in order to gain access to these abilities to any useful degree, we have to loose some of our limbs, with the fewer limbs you have, the more powerful your abilities. the reason for this being that the same parts of our brains that are responsible for our telepathic powers is also responsible for motor control, and it has a hard time doing both jobs at once because it gets confused or something, I'm not really sure exactly how it works. Anyway, the upshot of it is that, these psychic abilities are highly prized by most levels of our society, so what usually happens is that, sometime after puberty, most females of our species will begin have one or more limbs removed, usually only a single arm or leg at first, though some do more in hopes of gaining a shortcut, and begin learning to use their powers, then after they become good enough, they'll have another limb removed, and then another, and so on until there's no limbs left and they've fully mastered their abilities, which usually takes several years. That's unless you're warrior class of course, they keep their limbs."

"I see." you replied, a little shocked by this information, as you can hardly imagine giving up even one limb voluntarily, let alone all of them, but then again, your species doesn't gain psychic powers from doing so. Still, one thing troubles you about Ava's explanation. "So what happened to you? I mean, I'll admit I don't know much about your species, but you look pretty young, and judging by those bandages you had when I last saw you it looked like you'd just lost all your limbs at once, what's up with that?" you ask.

"Oh, that!" Ava said, making a face. "Well, you know how I said sometimes some people try and take shortcuts by loosing all their limbs at once? Well, my mom kind of insisted on that for me. I tried to tel her it was a bad idea and talk her out of it, but she didn't really give me a choice. Actually, she hasn't said so, but I think the real reason she had everything removed at the same time was because I uh, I kind of like to get in trouble. A lot. So, I'm thinking the real reason she did this was to punish me, make me learn self discipline or whatever. Kind of makes me wish i had paid more attention when she and grandmother Eviee were trying to teach me the basics of T.K., cause now I can hardly do anything! I mean, I've got all this power, but no control over it! It kind of sucks to be honest with you."

"Wow, that's harsh. Wait, did you say your grandmother is named Eviee? And your last name is Wan? You're that Eviee's granddaughter?!" you asked incredulously.

"Yea. Why so surprised? It's not that big a ship, lots of people on board are related to each other." she said.

"So it's like a family unit kind of?" you asked.

"Yea, pretty much. There's like three clans on board this vessel right now. there's my family, the Wan's, We're mostly scientists, healers and diplomats, though my aunt Grizella's warrior class. There's also the Niel family, most of the ships command crew are members of that family, as well as the majority of the warrior class, with the Gitall family making up the majority of the rest, mostly engineering and support staff, with a couple of independents thrown in for good measure.

But enough of that, I want to hear more about Earth!" she Ava said, seemingly fascinated by everything about you. You weren't really sure what to make of it, as you'd never had a pretty girl interested in you before, but you decided to make the most of it, doing your level best to explain to her your life on Earth and what it was like growing up there, with her asking numerous questions along the way with you doing your best to answer as many as you could. The thing that seemed to shock her the most though was when she discovered the fact that males and females on your planet lived together in pairs with one male and one female, with the male being the one in charge to at least some degree in most parts of the world.

"Wow, a world were every girl has a male of her very own! It must be wonderful to live there, even if the guys do try and tell you what to do." Ava said wistfully.

"I take it your society isn't like that." you said.

"Not even! Males are in such short supply among our species that I've never seen one. In fact, I have it on good authority that the males are slowly dying out, though no one knows why. What i do know is there's not a single Galval male on the entire ship. That's why we work so hard to find to find world with similar species like yours so that we'll have someone to mate with and avoid our species dying out. Uh, we also start to go a little crazy if we go too long without mating, or so I've heard." Ava said, a blush coloring her cheeks as she says it.

"Hmm. And have you ever mated before Ava?" you asked teasingly, your strength slowly returning as you become more active.

Smiling shyly, her face going even redder, Ava replies "No, but I've wanted to for a few years now, ever since the first time I went into heat. In fact, I'll be going into heat again in just a couple days. Maybe you and I could get together? We could even practice now if you want?" she offered.

Licking your lips, you wonder how you should answer that. While there was no question that Ava was incredibly cute, her lack of limbs and the total helplessness that went with it doing nothing to diminish that, indeed it made her sexier if anything, and you certainly wouldn't mind doing it with her, everything you'd heard from her so far also suggested that she was still a minor by her species standards, and if the laws concerning such things among the Galval were anything like those on Earth, you could end up in all kinds of trouble if you were caught, possibly ending up being shot out of an air lock without a space suit if you were really unfortunate. On the other hand, you didn't know how the Galval handled such things, or how old Ava actually was, and given why you were here, and the fact that she was literally asking for it, even if doing it with her was a crime, you just might be able to get away with it, and she was just so cute and sexy it was all you could do not to give in right away.

Your excitement is almost immediately replaced by shock and then horror as you watched your fellow colonists interact with the local inhabitants. The aliens were quite humanoid; two arms, two legs, a head, familiar facial features, normal human curves, and at least outwardly familiar anatomy. There were a couple of distinctive differences; even the shortest among them stood a whole head taller than the biggest human surrounding them, their hair and eyes were all uniform in color with a dark blue for the former and a light blue for the latter, their skin was unbelievably smooth and dark greenish color, and they had rather long horns jutting from their heads.
There were a group of around ten of them, all women huddled together in terror and surrounded by soldiers with guns. You watched as one of your fellow humans approached the shortest of the aliens, grabbing one of her horns and pulling her to the ground. She kicked and wailed as your crew mate sawed her horns off and began filling them down, but didn't attempt to run due to the amount of weapons trained on her.
"Is something wrong master?" You jump with a start as an oddly accented voice emanates behind you, nearly jumping to the ceiling. Turning around you see an alien, one that's clearly already gone through what the others out there are going through, her body altered to better serve you. Her horns had been filed down to small disks on her forehead, both of her nipples had been pierced, an electric collar had been placed around her neck, all four of her limbs had been amputated at the half way point and replaced with cybernetic prosthetics with very clearly labelled and large off switches, and her right thigh had been branded with your initials.
"Uh, no... uh nothing. Nothing is wrong uh..." You trailed off nervously, having no idea how to respond or even what her name was.
Seeming to at least pick up on the second half of your confusion she informs you "Oh, forgive me master! I forgot we'd never been properly introduced. My name is Shei' NadaAAAUGH!" the alien was brought to her knees, convulsing in pain as electricity coursed through her body when she tried to speak her native name. After a moment it subsided, the woman panting as she struggled back to her metal and plastic feet. "F-forgive me m-master. I am 839-B. Your colony's leader has assigned me and my sister to your servitude in gratitude for the contribution you made to forcing the warriors of my people into hiding. You met Ier- er, 838-B yesterday. They just finished with my modifications today."
"Right... 839..." You trail off, observing her body. She was very generously proportioned, wide hips and ample cleavage completely unrestricted by any clothing other than the collar. Realizing that you'd been staring at her for well over half a minute you turn your attention away, trying to spare her at least some dignity. Looking around you notice a remote lying on your desk, more specifically the remote to her collar and limbs judging by the labeling on the buttons. "So... what will you be doing for me?" You ask, avoiding eye contact with your gifted slave.
"Well, I am here to do any task you instruct me to and entertain you in any way you wish." She said, the implications clear.
Shit, this isn't exactly what you had in mind when you made this wish.

152311.content:
"I wish that I could change any aspect of reality just by willing it," Rachel says.

Alkazar seemed slightly taken aback, but then he smiled -- which, to Rachel, seemed only a barely-perceptible change to the brightness of the being's glow.

"I must say, I was not expecting one of you puny creatures to have such big thoughts," he admitted. "And I am interested to see what you do with them. Please hold on for one moment."

Not really knowing what to do, Rachel clutched for the fuzzy bathroom rug.

It didn't really matter. She felt her stomach drop as the rug, the floor, the bathtub, and everything she could sense suddenly seemed to be torn away.

For a second, which was still much too long, there was just nothing.

And then everything came slamming back into her.

Rachel found herself sprawled on her back on the tile, having to take a few deep breaths until her body stopped trembling and she could raise herself up on one elbow and look at Alkazar again. "What -- what was that?" she asked.

"I have duplicated the universe and swapped you with your duplicate self," Alkazar said as if it was as easy as ordering a pizza. "And in this version of the universe, just as you wished, you may change any aspect of reality just by willing it, and you are the only being with the ability to do so."

Rachel blinked and looked around. Same small bathroom with walls painted an ugly color. Same voluptuous body. "Um, so how do I..."

Alkazar answered the question she hadn't quite put into words. "You will know how to do it when you try. It will be as if you are flexing a muscle."

"And I can do anything?"

"Well, since you are not as practiced as I and others of my kind, I have put minor safeguards in place. You won't be able to destroy the universe outright, or change physical laws to an extent that make it impossible for it to exist. For now, the same is true of your planet, although that restriction will be lifted after -- shall we say one revolution at its current speed? One year from now."

"Okay," said Rachel, finally realizing how odd it was for her to be on the floor of her bathroom having a conversation with a glowing spherical object that was hanging in mid-air.

"And there's one more thing," said Alkazar. "If you tell any of your fellow humans about your power..."

153.content:
Your name is Eric, and your a fairly typical teenage American boy. You're in your room surfing the net one night, when suddenly, you're blinded by a bright flash of light and flung out of your chair and across the room as an incredible force hits you. Slowly, your vision clears, and you begin to pick yourself up off the floor, only to freeze in your tracks at the sight before you. Standing in your room is a man at least eight feet tall, incredibly muscular with pure white hair and beard, and eyes filled with stars bathed in a brilliant golden radiance.

"Who-who are you? Are you like, God or something?" you stammer nervously, amazed by the sight before you, but frightened by it as well, being unsure of the beings intentions towards you.

In answer to your question, the being intones in a voice like thunder "Not as you humans understand the concept, but it is as close to the truth as your feeble minds are capable of comprehending. I am Alkazar the All Powerful. I have watched the formation of galaxy's, seen countless stars be born, grow old, and die, their last ebbs of energy bleeding out into the cosmos. I have been watching you as well Eric Johnson, and I have chosen to grant you one wish. Anything you desire is within my power to grant, but be aware that your wish will affect not just yourself, but rather, the entire human race, every man, woman, and child, both born and those yet to be born, onwards to the ends of time."

"Anything I want, seriously?! And whatever I wish for will affect everyone?" you exclaim, unable to believe that this is really happening, certain that you must be dreaming, as you know something like this could never happen in real life. Still, it wouldn't hurt to make a wish, even if it would never come true. "Okay Alakazam..." you begin.

"Alkazar!" the all powerful being thunders.

"Whatever. My wish is, I want this to be a world where fantasy creatures exist and are considered an almost normal part of society, and magic actually works and is as prevalent, respected, and well understood as science, with everyone knowing about it and making use of it to some degree.

"That is your wish?" Alkazar intoned.

"It is." you confirmed, sure that, whatever else, if by some change this all does happen to be real, it would certainly make life, both for you and the rest of the world, a whole lot more interesting.

A deep thrumming noise, more felt than heard fills the room, as bright light shoots out from the glowing figure, blinding you temporarily. When your sight recovers enough for you to see again, Alkazar is gone. Still believing everything up till now to have been a dream, you crawl into bed, and soon you're fast asleep. The next morning when you wake up_______________?

She couldn't be much more than 5'2", pale white skin and a dainty little frame like a teenage girl. She physically looked like one of the least intimidating people you could imagine; her black miniskirt, black boots, red hair highlights, and spiked bracelets and choker failing to add to the menace. She may not look tough, but she still managed to send chills down your spine with her somewhat creepily nonchalant expression and the fact that she was licking drops of blood off of her lips... oh, and the fact that she was levitating! She floated about a foot off of the ground, her legs waving back and forth as though she were sitting on an invisible chair.
"Hi, sorry to wake you!" She squeaked, her voice sickening with its high pitch and levity.
You were at a loss for words. Nothing could have prepared you for this, and the only sentence you could form at the moment was the most obvious, stupid, and idiotic question possible. Still it managed to slip out and become audible. "Did you just suck my blood?!"
"Huh? Well yeah silly head, a gal's got to eat!" She replied. With a curtsy she dropped to the ground, landing with a click of her heavy rubber soled boots. "The name's Leslie, Leslie Hurston!" She said, extending her left hand to you.
Despite the clearly faked civility you felt... compelled to return her gesture. You extended your arm with a wince, your whole shoulder now sore from the bite which was still flowing blood at what was probably an unhealthy rate. You took her hand and shook it, surprised by how strong her shake was for such a small person. "Eric, Eric Johnson." You informed her.
"Nice to meet you Eric, sorry it was under these circumstances!" She said.
"Uh, alright... so, now that you've... you know, got me... am I a vampire now?" You asked nervously.

"One of the many perks of being a vampire is getting complete hypnotic control over anyone I've bitten or anyone I currently have eye to eye contact with. It helps when morsels like you try do something stupid like try to flee or get help." Leslie said while rubbing your cheek teasingly. "Now then, get in my belly!" She said in such an over the top Scottish accent you'd call her out as being a racist if it weren't for the fact that you were in the middle of being killed.
Leslie wrapped her hands around your chest tightly and sunk her teeth into your neck painfully. You began to feel nauseous as she drained the life out of your neck pint by pint, unable to run away as blood continued to seep from your wound. Just as you were about to slip into unconsciousness followed very shortly by death something happens. What is it?
153211.title: "No you're not a vampire, just a midnig...

choices: "Not exactly, you're an acolyte now... basically a slave.  Sorry!"
"Yeah, you will be by this time tomorrow unless you get help."
153212.content: She paused, her expression getting a little less light. She then said...
153212.title: a different response.

choices: "I only have female slaves and they keep whining about wanting a man!"
"I'm just a curious young woman... wink wink."
1532121.content:
"A what?" You ask, the word she used familiar in sound but not totally clear to you.
"An acolyte. Whenever a vampire drinks the blood of a normal human that person, assuming they aren't sucked dray and killed, become an acolyte to whatever vampire bit them. Acolytes literally HAVE TO obey any command they are given by their mistress or sire or die trying, must defend their sire or mistress with their life, must entertain their sire or mistress as a loyal pet would... basically you're a cross between a very obedient slave and a very loyal dog." She told you.
"YOU BITCH!" You roared, raising your fist at her.
Scorching hot agony shot through your whole skull, the feeling of jack hammering bouncing around in your head and forcing your to your knees. You clutched your head as tightly as you could, the pain only intensifying as you vainly struggled to to maintain consciousness. An eternity seemed to pass before the pain finally subsided, and when you looked up from your fetal position on the ground you saw Leslie's tiny body towering over you. "I also could've just ripped your arm off like it was made of tissue paper, point being I suggest you learn some manners really fast." Leslie said, using her boot to flip you onto your back.
"What... do you... want... with me?" You weakly asked, struggling to even get onto your hands and knees though you do manage.
Leslie's perky attitude seems to dissipate, her eyes loosing a little bit of their sparkle. "I don't really want you to be my slave. I am sorry to do this to you." She said, sincerity entering her voice for the first time. "It's just.." She paused, composing her thoughts, then continued...
1532121.title: "Not exactly, you're an acolyte now... ...

choices: They were all short and dainty, the tallest of them being only 5'4"
They are all muscular and very tall for women, the shortest being 5'10"
15321211.content:
"For a while now I've had exclusively female acolytes. I always felt more comfortable around them, more connected than with males. My opinion isn't universal though, and now they won't shut up about wanting a man in their ranks! It's always dude this! dick that! It's driving me up the wall!" She said, throwing her fists down in anger. "No matter how many times I hypnotize them, punish them, snap their limbs off like twigs, or even kill them they just won't shut up about stupid boys!" She shouted.
You forced yourself through sheer willpower not to laugh at how much of a teenage brat she sounded like, as her tone indicated that she was not in fact joking about the whole snapping limbs off or killing thing. "I finally caved in and decided to get them a new playmate. You, to be exact."
"Why me?" You asked, standing up slowly.
"I made the girls come to a consensus on the type of guy they wanted so they wouldn't be able to complain about my choice. They needed someone who was young so that you'll last a while, someone who was in good shape but not a strongman or anything, someone who's good looking but still approachable, and someone who's cute but not a pansy. After a little scanning of the area I decided that you fit that bill." She said.
"Oh." Was all that you could manage. You had very mixed emotions at the moment. On the one hand you had just been made the slave for life of some sort of powerful unholy creature of the night who had no qualms about damaging you physically and psychologically. On the other hand you were being kidnapped to be gifted over to a bunch of subservient females desperate for male accompaniment. Maybe it was your wonky teenage hormones or perhaps it was the severe blood loss but that almost sounded like a fair trade. Oh yeah, that. "Hey, I'm starting to get pretty woozy. Could you do anything about the gaping holes in my neck?" You asked.
"Normally I don't take orders from my servants, but since it's your first day I'll make an exception for you, just this once!" She said. Leslie strolled up and took hold of your throbbing shoulder, bringing it up to her lips. She licked away all of the excess blood, shivering against you as she did. She then pressed her hand against the wound. You felt a feeling of... not pleasure or pain, more of a general sense of relief. You looked down and saw that indeed the wound had been healed, your neck now looking as it always had.
"I didn't know vampires could do that." You said more to yourself than to Leslie.
"Yeah, we can heal any physical damage done to our acolytes by touch. It takes some energy, so I may have to grab a bite to eat on the way to my castle." She said. "Speaking of which we should head over there now, I'm sure the girls are dying to meet there new bot toy!" She then grabbed your wrist and began dragging you to the window.
"Wait, are we going to turn into bats?" You asked her, feeling like you knew where this was going.
"Are you kidding? Flying to my castle like that would take frigging forever! No, we're traveling by mist." She told you. You were about to ask what she was talking about when you were shown. Both you and Leslie seemed to explode, your bodies reduced to a fine red vapor in the blink of an eye. You could simultaneously feel everything and nothing, and your vision was the same. Before you could think too long on it you were pulled against your will, flying through the air at insane speed. You traversed miles in minutes, and before you knew it the two of you were standing before...
"Is that seriously your castle?" You ask, laughter entering your voice regardless of how hard you tried to hold it back. You felt the familiar sizzling sensation in your brain, the feeling of which forcing you to your knees. It subsided faster this time, only lasting a second or two but putting you in your place effectively.
"Shut up, times are tough! Besides, it has a huge basement, which is the only real reason we got this house." She told you. You got back up, nodding understandingly at her explanation. Standing before you was a quaint one story mud brick home, a four foot chain linked fence acting in place of mighty walls. "Come along now, we can't keep them waiting all day!" Leslie said, walking before you and waving you along.
This caught your attention. "Why are you naked?!" You shouted, noticing her pale bare back strut before you as she made her way towards the front door. You felt the breeze hitting your skin and looked down. "And why am I naked?!"
"Oh yeah, sorry about that. Clothes don't turn into mist like organic matter. Don't worry though, I'll have one of the girls pick up my outfit from your house later, and as for you you'll really only need two items of clothing." She said, cheerfully avoiding telling you what it was. "Follow me now." She ordered you. This wasn't like her previous statement, a request. This was a command, one that sent a chill through your being. Your limbs began to move against your will, pulling you helplessly towards the front door. Leslie opened it and stepped in, and all you could do was follow her into her house, like a passenger in your own skin. "I'm going to fetch some clothes for myself and a new uniform for you, go to the basement and wait for me." Despite never having set foot in this home before your body moved on autopilot through the house, passing through the kitchen, moving past the living room, and finally reaching the bolted shut entrance to the basement. You removed the bolt and began your decent, the decrepit wooden staircase somehow staying together as you went down.
As you went you saw that indeed this basement was huge, and occupied. Six females sat nearly naked at the base of the stairs, the only clothing on them being a leather collar with a link on the front and some sort of bracelet. All of there eyes were on you now, and a quick scan showed that despite many physical differences all of them shared the same basic body type.
15321211.title: "I only have female slaves and they keep wh...

choices: You know magic in this world!  You are able to fight Olivia off.
You don't know any spells since you aren't from this reality.  You're screwed!
15322.content:
You were fairly tall for your age, 5'10" and still growing. This woman though absolutely dwarfed you though, at least 6'4" if not taller than that. She seemed to be mostly human and mostly naked though there were exceptions to both of those statements.
The woman's legs were bent at angles impossible for a human being, looking like the thick powerful legs of a dog or some sort of wolf. Her arms ended in very furry forearms and hands with long sharp claws extending from the fingertips. Her face was mostly human in appearance, but had fur covered triangular ears, large amounts of short grey fur around the periphery, and bright yellow eyes.
As for the nakedness the whole front of her torso was exposed, giving you an unimpeded view of her large breasts and her hair covered snatch. She wore an open leather jacket that covered her arms and back, and had a spiked leather collar around her neck.
"What the fuck?! Are you... who are... what's going on?!" You asked, stammering as you backed away from the monster that stood before you.
"Well you managed to get one full sentence out, that's better than most people handle this. The short version goes something like this: I'm Olivia, I'm a werewolf, I've just bitten you, and now you're going to be a werewolf like me within the next 24 hours. Questions?" She asked.
You had many to say the least. "Why did you bite me? Why are you only partially transformed?! SINCE WHEN DID WEREWOLVES EXIST?!" You asked, growing more and more panicked.
"... Either you are a genuine retard or really not an early riser. I bit you so you'd be a werewolf too, duh. The more monsters running around the less magic spewing humans there'll be, and the fewer of you people running around the better in my book. We've only got a half moon going so I'm not at full power. Lastly I dunno. Lycanthropes have been around for like 350,000 years, but the werewolf subspecies is a little younger than that. Like 290,000? I can't remember, I tend to skip biology class." She told you, confused by your lack of knowledge for what to her were basic facts. You really should have been more careful with your wish!
You had so many questions but you had no time to ask them. Your door was kicked in violently and Stephenie stepped in, dressed only in her pajamas but wielding some sort of wand. You had no time to even begin understand what was going on as Stephenie said something in a tongue you didn't understand. From the tip of her wand a blast of ice shot out, slamming into the werewolf! She cursed as her right hand was frozen to the wall, pulling as hard as she could to free herself. Stephenie gave her no respite though and said another phrase, distinct from the prior one. A purple orb of energy blasted Olivia in her center of mass, slamming her into the wall hard. This action though had the unintended consequence of freeing her trapped limb. Olivia lunged at your stepsister with unimaginable speed, wrapping her claw covered hands around her neck and lifting her off of her feet. Stephenie cried out and struggled to break the beast's grip but was no match in a physical confrontation.
"Eric! Help!" Stephenie begged. With the last of her strength she tossed the wand to you, which you luckily caught.
Now what?
15322.title: A werewolf

choices: "Let's get to work on curing me."
"Actually... being a werewolf sounds pretty sweet."
153221.content:
Something bizarre happened, and considering what had that was saying something. Somehow grabbing this wand out of the air sparked something inside of you. Words and information that just moments before were alien to you suddenly were ingrained in your mind like they had always been there. You didn't know if this surge of knowledge and power was due to the wand itself, this universe catching up to you, Alkazar intervening in your affairs, or something else entirely. All you knew was that your sister was in danger and you now had a weapon.
You raised the wand and pointed it at the wolf woman, power seemingly concentrating In the limb that held it. "Lightning!" You said loudly. You didn't say it in English though, you instinctively said it in a North American standard Wiccan tongue, somehow remembering both the specific tongue and the words. From the tip of your wand a blast of energy was released, white lightning cracking through the air and smacking Olivia. Olivia seized up and grunted in pain, as if she had been hit by a particularly powerful taser. "Grab!" You shout in your newly discovered language without pause. At first nothing seems to happen and Olivia looks at you in confusion, then you flick your wrist right. Olivia is helpless tossed aside, losing her grip on Stephenie as she was thrown through the air at your discretion. You stopped moving your hand and Olivia stopped midair, turning in slow helpless circles as she failed to find gravity. You moved the wand up and down causing Olivia to crash first into the ground them into the ceiling. Finally you twisted your hand and with a sharp flip you sent her flying out of the open window.
As soon as your wand broke direct line with her Olivia was freed, slamming into the ground and rolling a short distance. You ran to the window an cast one final spell. "Hold." You said. Suddenly beams of light shackles themselves around Olivia's wrists and feet, binding her to the ground with her chest pressed firmly on the sidewalk. As Olivia violently thrashed you fell to your knees, suddenly drained of energy.
Stephenie ran to your side, snatching the wand from your hand and aiming it at your wounded neck. "Heal." She said in witch speak. To your relief the wound sealed shut, the flow of blood ceasing. You still felt rather weak, though at least now you wouldn't die of blood loss.
"Thanks for saving me." You said to your step sister.
"Likewise." She said with a laugh. "So, by the look of it that girl was a second generation Lycanthrope, not a born werewolf. You're pretty lucky, if we hurry we should be able to stop the transformation and you'll be able to keep your magic." Stephenie said. You knew somehow what he was talking about, the information now feeling familiar. Humans can use magic in this world because it is holy, monsters can't because they aren't. Monsters get great physical powers, humans get adaptability. It was a power trade off really.
You look up at your sister who's face looked worrisome. She was scared for her now infected brother. You said...

Speak to mum tomorrow, she can cure you if you want, and she knows more about lycanthropy than me and should be able to help you make a better decision. 15322121.content:
Feeling tired and achy, you placed your wand down, and collapsed on to you bed, and fell instantly asleep.

The remainder of the night was very unpleasant, unsettling images filling every moment of your dreams. Brutally hunting down animal, human and even some species that you were unfamiliar with at this moment, while been over looked by a large, luminous moon, soaked in the blood of your prey. This whole experience was terrifying, but you couldn't stop, you weren't even in control, you were a passenger in the monstrous body of the werewolf.

You shot up in bed looking around, it was still a mess from Olivia attack, and your bed seemed to be in a bigger mess than normal when you wake up. Placing a hand to your neck, you could still feel the scars of her bite. Standing up, you were still dressed, so you headed down stairs.

Looking out of the window, you could see the sun was not to high. Walking into the Kitchen, you saw your step-Mother, Cynthia. She was wearing large blue robes, that did well with holding onto her figure, while it looked like it was suppose to be respectable, it had been modified to fit her own personal preferences.
"Morning dear," she said, going about her business, "What happened last night in your room, there was quite a racket?"
"I was attacked by a werewolf," you say, trying to make it sound as casual as possible.
"What!?" she exclaims, rather concerned, "Are you all right?" she runs over to you, and examines you.
"I'm fine, Stephanie healed me," you saw, still in amazement that she could do that, "But I was bit."
"I have to act quickly," she said picking up a staff, and holding it up.
"WAIT!" you yell, "I want to be a werewolf, but Stephanie told me to talk it out with you before you cured me."

She pulled out a chair from under the table, and sat on it. You did the same.
"So you want to be a werewolf?" She asked curiously, to which you nodded. "It is true, they are strong, and more physically capable, stronger, faster, better senses."
"Yeah," you said, imagining all the the things you could do as a werewolf.
"However," she boomed, "They suffer from a loss of control with the moon, depending on the person, partially or completely, they are more aggressive and carve meat constantly, aren't liked or allowed in certain areas of society. And as you know they can't use magic."
You thought about all of this, trying to make such a big decision.
"And something else I should mention, they is no cure to Lycanthropy. If it finalizes, it's permanent." She noted, with large emphasize on 'no cure'.
You gulped, this was a large life changing decision.
15322121.title: We skip to the morning

153221211.content:
Your revolve and desire to be a werewolf waved a little, "I still want to become a werewolf," You insisted.
Cynthia gave a look, "You don't sound to sure."
"I am."
"What generation werewolf was it?"
"Stephanie said she was a second generation werewolf," You recalled.
"Then you start to develop werewolf features in a few hours, before turning into a third generation tonight," Your mother explained.
You jumped back in shock because of the shorter time periods you had, "But Stephanie said I had a week before that happened."
Cynthia shook her head, "Steph was never that good with Netherdieases and biology."
"Nether?"
"Yes, the parts of the world, being areas, monsters or dark mages, that have been disowned by they greed for power by looking to dark magic and forces."
"Like werewolves," You say gently.
Cynthia nodded, "A third generation werewolf if more vulnerable than a a first or second, the disease spreads slower and are less powerful. Do you still want to be a werewolf?"
You nodded, "I do."
Cynthia smiled, and stood up, "If that's want you want. I go and make arrangements with school," she said.
"Why?"
"First, they need precautions if turn into an animal on them, and...." she said walking in your direction, "You can't be in a magic class if your a flea bag," she said stroking you, you straightened your back, moving you head closer towards it, feeling relaxed and comforted by it, and Cynthia walked out, leaving you feeling unfulfilled.
Your stomach growled, and you made your self breakfast.
Sitting down, it seemed a lot, as you have made your self a few portions of cereal, toast and even a couple of bacon sandwiches but you were feeling hungry, hungrier than ever before.

I am Alkazar the All Powerful. I have watched the formation of galaxy's, seen countless stars be born, grow old, and die, their last ebbs of energy bleeding out into the cosmos. You simply figured you'd play the part as best you could in hopes of getting into the swing of things. After all, this is how the world is going to be from now on since you only got that one wish you made. No chance to ever change things back to the way things used to be. You watched your owner walk over to what appeared to be a large garage. It set attached to the side of the main house. Glancing left and right you see all of the houses on the street are similarly setup. Apparently this is where people kept their large human pets. Like some sort of large dog house.

Looking back in your Master's direction you see the door has come up to reveal what's inside. The floor being pure concrete. In the middle of the room was a huge pillow on top of a thin area rug. It didn't at all look the least bit comfortable. You frowned realizing this was your bedding. To the back were two bowls. One for food the other with water. Both being roughly the size of jacuzzis for your Master. The food one was empty while the water one was halfway full. Both seemed well used.

Your Master pulled a lever. A dispenser above the food bowl opened up dropping dry kibble into it. You knew it was actual dog food simply by the distinctive smell of the loose dust made.

"There you go boy. Your favorite. Eat up then I'll ride you to the park K." I promise, going back inside.

"Yes Master." you comply.

Crawling over to the bowl you want to vomit at the very thought of having to eat what's in front of you. You close your eyes making a wish for everything to go back to the way it was before. Opening them backup you see it didn't work. Your stomach groans. You fathom this was the only sort of food you'd be getting from now on.

Leaning down you reluctantly open your mouth and scoop some kibble up with your tongue. The taste is absolutely horrid. Dry, hard, and coarse textured it severely lacked any sort of palatable eatability. It took nearly all your will power to chew it up into a mushy goo coated in enough of your saliva to swallow. Then once the bowl was empty, it astonished you how you licked it clean wishing there was more. It stopped your hunger pains yet didn't fill you completely up. So you went to your water bowl to lap up the rest of what was left in it.

By the time you finished your Master stood leaning against the wall watching you. "Looks like you're done. Good boy!"

It freaked you out a bit thinking you would totally assume the life of the willing pet that you were in this world. Much more worrisome thinking it would make you happy to be that way. Before you could think any further on how to reverse this mess you've gotten yourself into you felt a clink on your dog collar.

"There we go! Okay Fluffball. Let's go to the doggy park." I command climbing up the side of your arm.

By muscle memory you let me step up onto your shoulder much akin the way elephants let their riders climb onto their backs. You took this moment to assess your Master. To you I looked about a year or so younger than you. Noticing a slight pudge in the gut you otherwise assumed I was of average height and build for being a tiny person to your perspective. If that was the case then maybe your mom was still alive. That prospect excited you making your heart quicken. You wanted nothing more than to see her again. info.brief_description: A teenaged boy is given a single wish by an all powerful being.
info.description:
LEGAL DISCLAIMER: This story is intended for adults only. Read at your own risk. This story is a work of fiction, as are all people, places, and events depicted within, no matter how closely they may resemble real people, places, or events. The actions taken by the characters of this story are often immoral, illegal, or perverted in nature, and in no way reflect the views of the author, nor are they encouraged to be undertaken by anyone in real life, ever, under any circumstances. Having said that..........

GREEN=notes.

RED=Don'ts, no no's, or whatever else you want to call them. Writing any of these is a good way to get your chapter deleted.

A teenage boy named Eric Johnson is given a single wish by an all powerful being. The catch is, whatever he wishes for must effect either every man on the planet, every woman on the planet, or both, and once the wish is made, it's effects are permanent. Also, he only gets one, no wishing for more wishes. Whether Eric is aware of these limitations, or even that he's been granted a wish in the first place before it's made and the effects manifest themselves is up to you, though Eric will eventually notice any changes made unless their subtle. Whether anyone else will become aware of the changes is also up to. Provided he's aware that he has a wish available, Eric can can also choose to pass the wish along to someone else if you so desire. The wish can also be granted any way you desire, so long as it fulfills the criteria of the words used, with as much or as little detail as you want, though try to keep it to no mare than a couple of paragraphs if possible. I personally plan on having most of the wishes I add granted as intended, though even then they might easily have unintended consequences. Other than that, anything is allowed aside from the following:

1. Absolutely no sex involving children. Sex involving teenagers is perfectly okay and expected however. Also, if something changes the rate at which humans reach adulthood or causes a child to physically become an adult, example body swapping or a spell that causes age progression that character is then considered an adult for the purposes of the story.

2. No wishing for everyone to become incontinent, or anything else related to those bodily functions. Also, while urine and feces can be mentioned if appropriate for the situation, they shouldn't be dwelled upon, or be a part of any sort of sexual act. You are still allowed to include anal sex if you want to however.

3.No making everyone fat, and no descriptions or images of sex involving fat people. I don't have any prejudice against fat people in general, or any problem with them being mentioned in the story, or even being one of the major characters, but I'm not attracted to them, and I don't want them becoming a main focus of the story, especially where sex is concerned.

4. No sex with corpses, or cannibalism. It's weird, it's creepy, and It's disturbing. You can however include something like a zombie plague or something should Eric's wish involve something like that, just no having sex with them. Also, Vore is okay. I know that may require a little clarification what with the no cannibalism rule and all, so basically, it works like this. Cannibalism, at least my definition of it, involves any human being eating the flesh of another, either for sustenance, religious reasons, or their own sick pleasure. (please note that zombies and near human fantasy monsters that are known to eat humans can not be cannibals because they are no longer human, or never were human in the first place.) Vore on the other hand involves one person eating another, usually by swallowing them whole, transforming them into a liquid and drinking them, or by transforming them into something normally considered eatable such as a piece of cake or pie and then consuming them, and is usually accomplished by the use of magic, and even then, the individual being consumed should not be harmed during the process( though they might be frightened), and should be able to be easily restore to normal at a latter date. If any of these criteria are not met, it will most likely be considered cannibalism and be deleted, though I might make an exception if the chapter is especially good.

5. No killing off the main character, or any other character, at least not without a good reason, and no dead ending an existing story line. You should always keep at least one option open so that other people can add to it. Also, when adding new wishes, the last available option should always be reserved for more options, and should read either More wishes, Another wish, A different wish, or something similar. I'll go back and change the titles to something more appropriate later as necessary.

Well, that's it on the rules for now, though I might add more latter if I decide it's necessary. Now, on with the show!

Meeting The Cast

Your name is Eric Johnson. A fairly average teenager, you're about five feet ten inches tall, with light brown hair which you keep cut short, dark blue eyes, pleasant features, and a build that manages to be slender without appearing skinny. You're a fairly decent kid for the most part, though you're something of a pervert, with a variety of odd fetishes, as well as being willing to chase after almost anything in a skirt, despite the fact that you have a steady girlfriend, something that sometimes causes problems between the two of you. You're also a bit of a prankster, and have been know to make important decisions without really thinking through the consequences from time to time. Shortly after your sixteenth birthday, you are visited by a magical being of great power who has chosen to grant you any one wish of your choosing, with the catch that any wish you make must affect all the men in the world, all the women in the world, or both, and regardless of what you choose to wish for, the effects are always permanent, unless Eric can somehow locate and travel to the home dimension of the being that gave him the wish in the first place and persuade him to reverse it somehow, a difficult prospect to be sure. You live in a large house on a four acre plot of land located at the outer edge of the suburbs of a major city, along with your family members, including.....

Randell Johnson- Eric's older brother, Randell is a nineteen year old collage student attending the local university, though he has yet to decide on a major. He stands 6 foot 2, with short spiky blonde hair, blue eyes, and an average build. He's fairly athletic, having participated in a variety of sports back in high school, though he was never a starter. Since moving away from home and entering collage he's become a bit of a party animal, and considers himself something of a ladies man, something that the ladies seem to agree with based on how many girls he's dated over the years. Personality wise, he's fairly similar to his younger brother in most respects, and the two of them get along well most of the time, except when they become involved in one of their frequent "Prank Wars" with each other. At the moment, Randell is living on campus, though he returns home to visit often since it's fairly close by and he hasn't entirely adjusted to collage life just yet. Randell, as well as Eric, are the sons of....

Daniel Johnson- Daniel, or Dan for short, is Eric's father. Having married for the first time late in life, Dan is six feet tall and 48 years old, with salt and pepper hair, strong features, and a build similar to that of his son though more muscular. He has worked at a number of jobs over the course of his life, mostly in the oil fields and the construction industry, and though he's hardly an expert, he can handle just about any vehicle, tool, or piece of equipment he's likely to come across with some degree of proficiency, and does all his own home repairs. Right at the moment, he's working on an off shore oil rig, and is often away from home for days, or even weeks at a time due to that fact. Personality wise, he's a very stubborn, no nonsense sort of individual with a firm belief in the value of hard work. He's married to.....

Cynthia Johnson- Formerly know as Cynthia Burk, Cynthia is Dan's second wife and the two of them have been married for a little over two years, Dan's first wife, Eric's mother Emily, having died in a car wreck five years ago. A trophy wife of sorts, Cynthia is a stay at home mom, and much younger than her husband, only 33 years old, and very attractive, standing five and a half feet tall, with long lush strands of fiery red hair, bright green eyes, a cute button nose, narrow waist, long sexy legs, a full firm heart shaped ass, and a natural set of full firm FF tits. Being of a more serious mindset than his friends, Lee often acts as the voice of reason for their little group, though he is still a teenage boy, and can often be talked into things that he knows he shouldn't do, especially if it involves girls. In addition to Eric, he is also friends with....

Taylor Long- A recent arrival in the area, Taylor became friends with Lee, and Eric a little less than a year ago when he arrived as a transfer student from a neighboring district. Standing just a hair over six feet tall, Taylor is 16 years old and a good basket ball player and a decent musician on the base guitar, with sandy blonde hair, and a slender athletic build. He's a fairly quiet individual, with a live and let live attitude, and generally tends to just go with the flow of things, and rarely gets all that worked up even when things aren't going his way.

Additional Characters:

Haley- Monica's younger sister, Haley is fourteen, going on fifteen, and rather cute, standing around 5'2", with long blonde hair, big blue eyes framed by long lashes set within a cute, childlike face, and a figure very similar to that of her older sister, though not (quite) as developed. She's a bit more of a girly girl than her sister, preferring skirts and dresses over the shorts and jeans Monica favors. She's also had a crush on you almost from the moment she met you, and is always asking you to take kiss her, take her on dates, and other such nonsense, something that makes you somewhat uncomfortable, as she's really to young for you, not to mention that you're dating her sister, and her behavior has caused no end of arguments between the two sisters.

In addition, if you fell the need to add your your own original characters to the story, please feel free to do so, just don't forget about the original characters, as they are the people Eric is closest to.
